DOC.brief_title: Effect Extensively Hydrolyzed Liquid Human Milk Fortifier Growth Tolerance Moderately Premature Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , double-blinded study preterm infant bear 28-34 week gestation admit NICU University Kansas Hospital . After obtain informed consent , baby randomize either liquid powder HMF use opaque , seal envelope preassigned randomization . The feeding protocol establish KU NICU follow , begin initiation trophic feed , advancement enteral feed depend gestational age precede illness . Once infant reach 80ml/kg/day enteral feed , human milk fortify 22 kilocalorie add either liquid powder fortifier . The beginning study ( Study day 1 ) define reach tolerate 100ml/kg/day 24 kilocalorie human milk fortify either liquid powder fortifier . Enteral feed advance per unit protocol reach 150-160ml/kg/day 110-120 kcal/kg/day . volume feed adjust base documented weight provide energy protein requirement recommend ESPGHAN guideline . Babies follow time NICU discharge .
